general.mainHeader: Koviva - your reliable partner in liquid cargo transportation across Europe and CIS

about.contentCaptionThirdPart: of experience and an individual approach to each client.
about.contentInfo: The Koviva team tackles the most complex logistics challenges with high efficiency, leveraging years of experience. We meticulously plan each shipment, taking into account all the nuances and requirements for your cargo. Thanks to our expertise and cutting-edge technologies, we ensure the safe delivery of cargoes of any complexity.

advantages.advantagesHeaderSecond: The advantages of working with us:

firstLine.content1: Мы чётко понимаем потребности клиентов и успешно решаем сложные логистические задачи
firstLine.content2: Гибкость и эффективность в решении Ваших логистических задач. Соблюдение требований

secondLine.content1: Гарантируем своевременную и безопасную доставку вашего груза благодаря опыту и профессионализму
secondLine.content2: Гарантируем высокое качество обслуживания и удовлетворенность клиентов

services.infoCaption: Comprehensive solutions for reliable and safe delivery of your cargo.
services.infoContent: We provide a full range of services for transporting bulk cargoes in Europe and the CIS with a guarantee of reliability and safety
services.service5: Delivery of various types of semi-trailers
services.service7: Selection and sale of equipment from Europe
